__TOC__

PennBot is the Pennsylvania, USA Loco team's IRC bot.

It is a Supybot, with certain plugins loaded.

The plugins it currently uses are: Infobot, Later, Channelstats, Google, Karma, Seen, Web.

The bot is managed by <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:trekcaptainusa-tw|Thomas Ward]]</nowiki>, who uses the nicks Resistance/EvilResistance on IRC (freenode).  Their wiki page can be found here: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Thomas%20Ward
